name: Enguru
description: Enguru, an edtech startup funded by the Michael & Susan Dell Foundation and Village Capital, offers employability-focused English training through innovative technology. Our flagship product, the Enguru Spoken English app, has over 40 million users and is available in 28 languages, teaching English from basics to industry-specific functional skills.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Enguru: Level Up Your English for Work with Personalized Learning
ShortDescription: Live English learning made effective, fun and easy.

Highlights.name: Unlocks Career Opportunities
Highlights.description: Enguru equips users with job-ready English skills through live classes and interactive exercises.

Highlights.name: Affordable & Accessible
Highlights.description: Enguru offers a flexible learning path in 28 Indian languages, making English learning accessible for all.

Highlights.name: Engaging & Effective
Highlights.description: Enguru's blend of live classes, gamification, and personalized learning keeps users motivated and on track to fluency.

enhanced_description: Enguru offers employability-focused English training through innovative technology, including its flagship Enguru Spoken English app which serves over 40 million users. The platform provides comprehensive English instruction from basics to industry-specific functional skills, available in 28 languages. Key features include self-paced learning, live classes, interactive activities, games, gamification, and personalized learning paths, all designed to equip users with job-ready English skills and unlock career opportunities.
key_use_cases: English language skill development for career advancement
Employability enhancement and job readiness training
Workforce upskilling and reskilling in English proficiency
Supporting talent acquisition by improving candidate English skills
Providing English language training as an employee benefit
competitive_advantages: Diverse learning methodologies (self-paced, live classes, interactive activities, games, gamification, personalized learning)
Strong financial backing (Michael & Susan Dell Foundation and Village Capital)
roi_benefits: Enhanced hiring manager confidence and productivity
Increased employee employability and career progression
Development of job-ready English skills within the workforce
Cost-effective and accessible language training solution
scalability_features: Designed to support a large user base (over 40 million users reported)
Supports global and large enterprise deployments
